internal.content:
---
title: "Initial ELK Setup"

---



## 游닌 STEP: Open ELK



1. In your OpenShift Console click on the Applications Menu
	
	![image](./../images/14_elk.png)

1. Select **Logging**


1. Click `Allow selected permissions`
	
	![image](./../images/14_elk_2.png)



## 游닌 STEP: Initialize ELK



1. Input `app*` for the index pattern
	
	![image](./../images/15_elk.png)
	
1. Click `Next Step`

1. Select `@timestamp` for the Time Filter
	
	![image](./../images/16_elk.png)
	
1. Click `Create Index Pattern`

1. Click on `Discover`

1. ELK is now configured. Verify that you have Logs coming in.
	
	![image](./../images/17_elk.png)
	
	


<InlineNotification kind="success">

**You have successfully finished this Chapter**

You are now done with the chapter on creating Training Resources.

Please continue to the next chapter to learn how to Configure CP4WAIOPS.

</InlineNotification>

---
title: "Initial ELK Setup"

---



## 游닌 STEP: Open ELK



1. In your OpenShift Console click on the Applications Menu
	
	![image](./../images/14_elk.png)

1. Select **Logging**


1. Click `Allow selected permissions`
	
	![image](./../images/14_elk_2.png)



## 游닌 STEP: Initialize ELK



1. Input `app*` for the index pattern
	
	![image](./../images/15_elk.png)
	
1. Click `Next Step`

1. Select `@timestamp` for the Time Filter
	
	![image](./../images/16_elk.png)
	
1. Click `Create Index Pattern`

1. Click on `Discover`

1. ELK is now configured. Verify that you have Logs coming in.
	
	![image](./../images/17_elk.png)
	
	


<InlineNotification kind="success">
